title: Syria's defiant Kurds vow to 'fight until last breath' despite government push
summary_full: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.
summary_public: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.
